title: Freelance Income + Big Project
prompt: I do freelance work so my income varies, but let's say $5200 monthly average for planning purposes. Regular monthly expenses are roughly $4000. I've got this big client project paying $8000 that hits my account in June. But I'm also planning a vacation in July that'll probably cost around $3500 total. Starting scenario: March 2024, $3000 starting cash, need to see if this works through September.
